recipe.title: Cream of Potato Soup
instructions: Place ingredients in electric blender in order indicated. Cover container and turn on blender. Mix about 1 minute. Pour into saucepan or double boiler and heat thoroughly over moderate heat, stirring frequently. Serve immediately in soup cups, sprinkled with chives. For a richer soup, stir in 1/2 cup light cream.
